info.name: Books_REST_API_GoogleApi
info.description: This is a simple REST API developed in Flask as a Recruiting Task for a role in STX NEXT company :)

request.description:
This will show a list of all books and will allow to filter and sort them by a published_date. The filtering and sorting info will be shown in url, as e.g. 
    /books?published_date=1995
    /books?sort=-published_date

This endpoint will allow users to select particular book by its id. A format of returned data is a json, and looks as follows:
{
    "title": "Hobbit czyli Tam i z powrotem",
    "authors": ["J. R. R. Tolkien"],
    "published_date": "2004",
    "categories": [
        "Baggins, Bilbo (Fictitious character)"
      ],
    "average_rating": 5,
    "ratings_count": 2,
    "thumbnail": "http://books.google.com/books/content?id=YyXoAAAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api",
}

This will show a list of all books and will allow to filter and sort them by a published_date. The filtering and sorting info will be shown in url, as e.g. 
    /books?published_date=1995
    /books?sort=-published_date

This endpoint can be used to save data to a db from a request body. Data is in json format, and looks as follows:
    {"q": "war"}

This endpoint can be used to save data to a db from a request body. Data is in json format, and looks as follows:
    {"q": "war"}
